mapper.select: SELECT ia.answer_id, ia.inquiry_id, ia.admin_id, ia.answer_content, ia.created_at, ia.updated_at, u.username as admin_username FROM inquiry_answer ia LEFT JOIN admin a ON ia.admin_id = a.admin_id LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ia.answer_id = #{answer_id}

SELECT ia.answer_id, ia.inquiry_id, ia.admin_id, ia.answer_content, ia.created_at, ia.updated_at, u.username as admin_username FROM inquiry_answer ia LEFT JOIN admin a ON ia.admin_id = a.admin_id LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ia.inquiry_id = #{inquiry_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry_answer (inquiry_id, admin_id, answer_content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{inquiry_id}, #{admin_id}, #{answer_content}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE inquiry_answer SET answer_content = #{answer_content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE answer_id = #{answer_id}
